title: Kenja No Deshi Wo Nanoru Kenja ~Mariana No Tooki Hi~
alternative_title: 賢者の弟子を名乗る賢者～マリアナの遠き日～ ; Kenja no Deshi o Nanoru Kenja ~Mariana no Tooki Hi~ ; She professed herself A pupil of the wise man ~Mariana's Day~ ; She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man ~Mariana's Day~ ; The Sage Professed Herself A Pupil Of The Sage ~Mariana's Distant Days~
status: 賢者の弟子を名乗る賢者～マリアナの遠き日～ ; Kenja no Deshi o Nanoru Kenja ~Mariana no Tooki Hi~ ; She professed herself A pupil of the wise man ~Mariana's Day~ ; She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man ~Mariana's Day~ ; The Sage Professed Herself A Pupil Of The Sage ~Mariana's Distant Days~
description:
Description :
        A spinoff of *She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man* starring Mariana as the main character!
“Actually, about 10 years ago, I took care of a girl.”
This is a tale of memories from some time ago, woven by Mariana, who waited 30 years for the wise man——.
___
